items.title: Chapter 1: Glass Currents
items.synopsis: Mara bargains with a coral-coded AI colony for safe passage through the rift.

items.title: Prologue: Eventide
items.synopsis: A fractured distress signal pulls the Halcyon into an anomaly on the edge of mapped space.

items.title: Chapter 2: Dirge of Suns
items.synopsis: An allied captain mutinies, threatening to expose their hidden jump coordinates.
